channel.title: Need help on a problem? PLEASE?
channel.description:
[CODE] Connecting no midi or mp3 files in folder connected to update server loading custom spirts part 1 loading custom spirts part 2 headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string : "%1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.orbs(client.java:12360) at client.method62(client.java:3469) at client.method7(client.java:2582) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120) at client.run(client.java:5383) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE]
That is my error on my client DOS box once I try logging in.
[CODE] Voule Auto restart Restarting server Pwnscape Server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:116) [/CODE]
Thats the error once I start my server from the server folder..
(The last thing I was doing was editing the bonuses for weapons.)
If you understand how to fix, or what the problem is, can you please help? Thanks =/

item.title: Need help on a problem? PLEASE?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Use TAB’s for spaces in your Item.cfg, and have Underscores in between word gaps, to avoid errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on a problem? PLEASE?

@de_dust89 wrote:

Thanks but someone helped me =p

item.title: Need help on a problem? PLEASE?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Connecting
no midi or mp3 files in folder
connected to update server
loading custom spirts part 1
loading custom spirts part 2
headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded
Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string
: "%1"
        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at client.orbs(client.java:12360)
        at client.method62(client.java:3469)
        at client.method7(client.java:2582)
        at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120)
        at client.run(client.java:5383)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

That is my error on my client DOS box once I try logging in.

Voule Auto restart
Restarting server
Pwnscape Server.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
        at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283)
        at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173)
        at server.main(server.java:116)

Thats the error once I start my server from the server folder…

(The last thing I was doing was editing the bonuses for weapons.)

If you understand how to fix, or what the problem is, can you please help? Thanks =/

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on a problem? PLEASE?
